footer_description: Cook DApp is our attempt to make it possible for people around the world to share a piece of their identity, culture and customs, and what better way to do it than from the kitchen through your favorite recipes.
login_text: connect your NEAR wallet and access an endless number of recipes, recipe books and get rewards for your awesome taste.
landing_banner_title: let others know about your culture
landing_banner_text: there are many users out there waiting for you to share and explore recipes through our Dapp, try new things, try CookDApp.
